thread.title: Arson down, malicious damage to property up
thread.title_full: Arson down, malicious damage to property up | News24

author: news24.com
title: Arson down, malicious damage to property up
text:
Cape Town - Total contact-related crimes have increased by 1.9%, according to the crime statistics released on Tuesday.
Arson decreased by 6.1% in 2014/15.
But malicious damage to property increased by 2.3% from 117 983 to 120 662.
"When we look at that... contact-related crimes decreased in six provinces," said national police commissioner General Riah Phiyega.
